{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Tl-wr841n eu 13.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 300Mbps Wireless N Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR841N.html |sp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR841N_V13.html |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WR841N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v13.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/07/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WR841N_v13.x |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7WR841NV13 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500850 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628NN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 575 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ESMT;M14D5121632A-2.5B; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 18:D6:C7, D4:6E:0E, F4:F2:6D, C4:71:54 |oui = 18:D6:C7, D4:6E:0E, F4:F2:6D, C4:71:54
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.3.0.0; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/01/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833704039 |asin = B0019EQ1RW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B001FWYGJS |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500850" and "1642" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3214016 FCC photos]. :"TL-WR841N(TPD) Ver:13.0" is silkscreened on the sticker. {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4|TP-LINK TL-WR841HP}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=70687 ''OpenWrt on TL-WR841N v13 or TL-WR840N v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :<small>'''Note''': TL-WR840N v4 have 5 leds: power, wifi, lan (one led for all ports), wan, lock(wps). :::TL-WR841N v13 have 8 leds: power, wifi, lan4, lan3, lan2, lan1, wan, lock(wps).</small> :[https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/974/commits/8706b608f4848940275cdb523e6bb85705769728 ''ramips: add initial support for TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4''] :Specification: :- SoC: MediaTek MT7628NN (580MHz) :- RAM: 64 MiB (Winbond W9751G6JB-25) :- Flash: 8 MiB (GigaDevice GD25Q64CSIG) :- LAN: 4x 100M, WAN: 1x 100M :A firmware update TL-WR841N(EU)_V13_170622 from 07/07/17 :Add New features/enhancement: :1. Add Access Point/Repeater/WISP mode. :2. Add IPTV function. :3. Add auto reboot function. *[https://forum.freifunk.net/t/tp-link-tl-wr841n-v13-wird-in-de-ausgeliefert/14289 On '''FreiFunk''' forums]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr841n_v13 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
